title: This Ai-san, That Ai-san
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>W-, wow! Can Ai really wear this outfit?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah! Ruby made it for you, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Uwaaah! Thanks~! Then, Ai will go put it on!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>It looks good on you~! It really does, Ai-san! More than Ruby ever expected~! You look gorgeous like this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ehehe, thank you~ You’re amazing Ruby, it’s so delicate yet easy to move around in~. Hey, what face do you think the others will make when they see me in this on stage?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Fufu, it’s different from your usual style, isn’t it? So they will probably be surprised.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Right~!? They will totally go, “Eh, that’s Ai!?” won’t they!? Ai really wants to see everyone’s surprised face~! Hey, can Ai wear this for my next live?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Of course! Both Ruby and the costume will be delighted if you wear it at a live!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Alright! Ai will do a perfect live for this outfit, so come and watch me, okay Ruby?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
